configNote: Feb 13: TRADING STOPPED. System was churning (10min cron + broken position tracking). Lost $3,460. Investigating before restart.
changelog: Feb 13 18:00: EMERGENCY STOP - Found $3,460 loss from churning trades. Dashboard was showing fake +$10k profit.
Feb 13 11:00: Disabled all trading crons. Removed duplicate system cron. Syncing dashboard with real Kraken data.

postMortem.issue: System cron running every 10 min + OpenClaw cron at :05 = duplicate execution
postMortem.rootCause: Position tracking broken - signal checker didn't know about existing positions
postMortem.result: 17 trades in 1 hour, massive fees, small losses compounded
postMortem.lessonLearned: Must verify position tracking works before live trading
